page.title: 12WELD LAWN TENNIS CLUB
page.content: Weld Lawn Tennis Club is situated in the centre of Birkdale on Weld Road. It is one of 11 'member only' lawn tennis association approved lawn tennis clubs in Southport.It has excellent facilities which includes an electric ball machine which 'fires' balls at you to enable you to practice on your own. The club itself has the four best clay/shale courts in Lancashire and is regularly the venue for the Lancashire open junior tournament finals.The club has a large membership (about 150) but this doesn't mean that a court isn't always easily accesible for play should you desire it. Weld L.T.C. has 60 junior members with 2 teams and 90 senior members with 7 teams.Each team has eight members.Weld LTC is open to any standard of player of any age.
